extendedInfo.description: Battery Saver â Worldâs best power manager with 15,000,000+ downloads and 4.5 star rating! GO Battery Saver & Widget is a powerful and smart tool to reduce power consumption and extend battery life by up to 50% . Main features include power testing, smart saving, toggle control, power ranking, etc. Never worry about finding a charger in the middle of the day again!User Comments"I love the widgets and the ability to make your own modes. This is the best battery app I have found." - Padraig Comer"Thanks for this brilliant battery life saver. I wouldn't know what I would do with out it." - Premlata Shinh"What else can I write? Its a great app with a lot of great function. Must have:-)" - Krzysiek SkiperFree Features- Smart battery save by turning off Wifi or mobile Data when screen off- Battery Consumption Optimization automatically start when screen off or remained battery power under threshold, etc.- Choose from multiple Saving Modes best fits your needs, including General Saving Mode, Super Saving Mode and Advanced Customized Mode- Battery consumption optimization in just one click- Charging Maintenance to help keep the charging process safe and healthy- Fantastic personalized UI Design (Widgets & Themes)Pro Features- Extreme Saving Mode to maximize battery life- Charging History to record your charging habits with the aim of giving better battery maintenance to your phone- CPU Smart Control- More Toggle Control- More fantastic personalized UI Design (Widgets & Themes)Contact UsEmailï¼golauncher@goforandroid.comUse of this app is governed by our Terms of Service: http://www.goforandroid.com/GDTEN/terms-of-service.htm and Privacy Policy: http://www.goforandroid.com/GDTEN/privacy.htm

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love the widgets and the ability to make your own modes. This is the best battery app I have found.
reviews.author: Padraig Comer

reviews.title: REVIVED!!
reviews.comment: Finally, thanks for the return of the screen mini widget...Totally optimize with ease....
reviews.author: Muhammad Shabree

reviews.title: nice
reviews.comment: hm thats beter app then other power saving apps in market
reviews.author: SHEIKH AMMAR

reviews.title: Smart made switching doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: The smart mode switching by time is not working on my HTC one. after it automatically switched to super save, the WiFi and data were still on.
reviews.author: jin cheon

reviews.title: GALAXY S4 GT\342\200\223I9500
reviews.comment: can this apps charging speed improved fix bugs......make it better.if this apps good .i will like and give 5 star..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closing
reviews.comment: It keeps on force closing on the background so i have to open it every once in a while manually
reviews.author: Kevynn Delgado

reviews.title: Messes up other apps and settings
reviews.comment: After downloading this and playing with it for a few days, I\'m not receiving enterprise emails, my wifi connection does not work, and I can\'t get my ringtone to diligence once I hit full charge. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Mike Learned

reviews.title: Good, but unreliable updates
reviews.comment: Wonderful ideas, but the developers update this app constantly without fully testing. There is always a new flaw. And they change menus so much it\'s almost a new app update...this gets annoying.
reviews.author: Alan Blanchet

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This app help me especially to remind me to charge it... Also, I\'d never got overcharged again since I install this app...
reviews.author: Stefani Ratu

reviews.title: Suspension window
reviews.comment: Great! You brought back the suspension windows Good job!!!
reviews.author: Madhav Unuth

reviews.title: Why only supersave?
reviews.comment: When battery goes below a certain point mobile data switches off - great. But only with supersave, not with custom save. No smart switching by power... no closed/open switch im mode or custom. where\'s the customization in that?
reviews.author: Lord Childe

reviews.title: amazing ..
reviews.comment: all mt classmate in college was saying that this app  is great .. its beautiful .. good work ..
reviews.author: angel Ocde

reviews.title: HELP!!!
reviews.comment: I really like this application. SO I used 200 of my getjar points to get the advanced features but I don\'t know how to activate it.
reviews.author: Penny Davis

reviews.title: Poor widget after update
reviews.comment: The New spinning wheel pop up that comes out when you press the widget is EXTREMELY unintuitive and redundant... it needs to be removed or at least have an option to not use it.
reviews.author: Tony Holguin

reviews.title: \"Love\" cannot express...
reviews.comment: ..How much I have truly become infaturated with this app. Two things though. Color options for battery icon would be nice. Also, I hate how I can\'t use any other mode but power saver when percent < 20. I wanna use my own! Otherwise it works flawlessly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better then easy battery saver!
reviews.comment: I love this app. The easy battery saver makes my tablet hot. I keep going back to this one.  Bc it really works. The go power master doesnt make my tablet hot. Yes easy battery saver is also a good app but I see the difference between them. I can honestly say! Download this app ...
reviews.author: princesslovely sc

reviews.title: The description lies
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t have 15 000 000+  It has 10 000 000+ Fliers but its good
reviews.author: Starleigh Petersen

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Battery time estimate is way off. Battery drops 10% with a half hour use, but at 29% it says I have almost 12 hours left!
reviews.author: Anthony Stump
